channel.title: Need Help on my server
channel.description:
Well i had all my npc's on my server and now when i logged back they were gone and i thought wtf so can anyone help me to get all my NPC'S back
Thx

item.title: Need Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @godorangeing godorangeing
item.description:
@godorangeing wrote:

hey can someone plz help me could someone who made a sever plz make an updated server tutorial i really want my own server but the tutorials that are there really suck

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @lolwut69 lolwut69
item.description:
@lolwut69 wrote:

[quote=“propker, post:6, topic:256385”][quote author=~Kyle link=topic=338651.msg2628674#msg2628674 date=1231978954]

Is this RSC?

If so, what source?

If this is rsc im assuming u spawned npcs with admin command? and now there gone? IF so use a diffrent command that will KEEP the npcs there and spawn back.

It’s called .xml editing, not commands to spawn things.
[/quote]

Its called a command that will “xml ediot for you” are you a complete moron?[/quote]No, he isn’t a moron. YOU are the moron.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“propker, post:6, topic:256385”][quote author=~Kyle link=topic=338651.msg2628674#msg2628674 date=1231978954]

Is this RSC?

If so, what source?

If this is rsc im assuming u spawned npcs with admin command? and now there gone? IF so use a diffrent command that will KEEP the npcs there and spawn back.

It’s called .xml editing, not commands to spawn things.
[/quote]

Its called a command that will “xml ediot for you” are you a complete moron?[/quote]
No, I’m not a complete fucking moron, .xml editing is so fucking simple and easy, if you need a command to spawn your shitty NPC’s all over the map, you should just give up.

Read full topic
